doc.field: Avery Inc said it began a public offering of two mln shars at 50.25 dlrs per shares. PUrchasers of the shares are entitled to get one additional share for each share purchased to give effect to the two-for-one stock split approved by the board February 26. There are about 19.9 mln shares outstanding on a presplit basis, it said. Proceeds will be used to reduce borrowings and other general purposes. Reuter
